text: Bigu ej Rasul: «Dar mijoni on ci ʙar man vahj sudaast, cizero, ki xurdani on harom ʙosad, namejoʙam, cuz xudmurda jo xuni rexta dar vaqti zaʙh, jo gusti xuk, ki hamono palid ast jo hajvone, ki dar kustanas az cihati nofarmoni kardan, ʙe guftani nomi Alloh zaʙhas kunand».Va har, ki darmondavu nocor savad ʙa saʙaʙi gurusnagii saxt, pas ʙixurad az in haromsudaho ƣajri tacovuzkunanda. Hamono Parvardigori tu omurzandavu mehruʙon ast
